featured.text: RTRI officials explain that deer have a habit of repeatedly snorting short, shrill sounds to alert other deer when they perceive danger.

definition.zh_def: 尖銳刺耳的聲音，通常令人不快。
definition.en_def: A high-pitched and piercing sound, often unpleasant.
definition.example: The shrill whistle of the train could be heard from miles away.
